alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Fluvanna (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 6:46PM EDT until June 12 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cumberland County in central Virginia... Southwestern Fluvanna County in central Virginia... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 646 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fork Union, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Fork Union around 650 PM EDT. Duncan around 710 PM EDT. Lakeside Village around 720 PM EDT. Cartersville around 725 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Dixie, Trents Mill, Cohasset, Whiteville, Shores, Carysbrook, Central Plains, Bremo Bluff and Trenton Mills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
